'''''Waveriding Adventurer (III)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete 6 Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Morte Region]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]].
